title: Minesweeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Reveal a player at night, learning their role and how many of their 4 closest neighbours are evil.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roles with detection immunity show up as good.
- If you target an evil player, you will die.
- You may target yourself.

desc:
Post 1090
*Dammit, this one's a fifty-fifty. I hope I get lucky.*
